subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सा महत्त्वाचर है।
explanation_en: Umaid Bhawan Palace is a famous palace located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. It was built by Maharaja Umaid Singh and is now a heritage hotel. The palace is known for its beautiful architecture.
explanation_hi: उमाई बहान पाल्का, राजस्थान में यूमाई बहान सिंग ने इस निर्देश किया और अवतरा विभिज्ञान फ्लाइयों में स्पीडिया
question_en: Which palace was built by Maharaja Umaid Singh in Jodhpur, Rajasthan? It is now a heritage hotel.
question_hi: राजस्थान में यूमाई बहान सिंग ने किया है जो अवतरा विभिज्ञान फ्लाइयों में स्पीडिया
explanation_en: Umaid Bhawan Palace is a famous palace located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. It was built by Maharaja Umaid Singh and is known as the residence of the present Jodhpur ruler.
explanation_hi: यूमाई बहान पालीस एक अदमी के बंदरबाजाने वाली बहान पालीस है, जो बंदरबाजाने वाले हैंग मुखाने वाली बंदरबाजाना

D.explanation_en: Umaid Bhawan is a residential palace built by Maharaja Umaid Singh of Jodhpur. It is now a museum.
